snippet.title: Athenian Rhapsody Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1671720/Athenian_Rhapsody/

Pick it up on Steam and leave a review! Also, buy it everywhere else several times!!!

Traverse Athens by either BEFRIENDING or DEFEATING enemies - growing stronger and collecting EXP, or growing the size of your party! The game rewards players who think outside of the box and venture into uncharted territory - you’ll discover that the story can be shaped and molded in more ways than you could ever imagine.

In this choose your own adventure RPG, you collect Rhapsodies -special postcards created uniquely from each playthrough you complete. You can trade Rhapsodies with your friends cross platform, which lets you narrate their ENTIRE save file back to you. Fight epic battles against chubby cats in basements, solve intense puzzles like Spell Richard, and then share it with your friends to compare your adventures.

The world of Athens is SO big, that you could discover routes and pathways you didn’t even know existed by checking out your friend’s Rhapsodies.

Athenian Rhapsody is releasing onto PC, Switch, Xbox, Playstation, iOS and Android on the date mentioned in the video above.

Find more information on Athenian Rhapsody at the links below:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1671720/Athenian_Rhapsody/
Discord Community: https://discord.com/invite/qCvTXQjcZF
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@athenianrhapsody?lang=en
X: https://twitter.com/AthenianRhapso1
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/athenian_rhapsody/
Press Kit: https://1drv.ms/f/s!AhATlp6JcH-ngdxxCItaNaHlNc46zA?e=N9KXe1
